caption.p:
Rb3 suppressed CPT-evoked mitochondrial apoptosis in GP-293 cells. (a) Flow cytometry of JC-1 staining for mitochondrial membrane potential change. (b) Quantitative analysis for mitochondrial membrane potential change. (c) Western blotting for the expression levels of Bax and Bcl-2. (d) Quantitative analysis of densitometry for the expression of Bax and Bcl-2.
∗∗
p < 0.01 and
∗∗∗
p < 0.001 compared to the control group; # p < 0.05 and ## p < 0.01 compared to the CPT group.
